elements.name: q1
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you been upset because of something that happened unexpectedly?

elements.name: q2
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you felt that you were unable to control the important things in your life?

elements.name: q3
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you felt nervous and stressed?

elements.name: q4
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you felt confident about your ability to handle your personal problems?

elements.name: q5
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you felt that things were going your way?

elements.name: q6
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you found that you could not cope with all the things that you had to do?

elements.name: q7
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you been able to control irritations in your life?

elements.name: q8
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you felt that you were on top of things?

elements.name: q9
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you been angered because of things that happened that were outside of your control?

elements.name: q10
elements.title: In the last month, how often have you felt difficulties were piling up so high that you could not overcome them?
